price: 23. Kuwaasi weeye kuwa uu Alle nacladay, markaasuu ka dhego iyo indho tiray (Xaqa).
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu fa-aṣammahum wa-aʿmā abṣārahum
